item.title: Need help on making my Xp faster!
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Search for:

sendMessage("You Attack The Dummy.");

You should see:

sendMessage("You Attack The Dummy."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12;

Change the numbers next to the last ( to the xp you want to be given:

addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18);

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on making my Xp faster!

item.title: Need help on making my Xp faster!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

ok look search for any of this or just find the case #

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the Door.."); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((60*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Now the numbers before the “*” <–star is the amount of XP gained everytime the person hits the door, you can change this with anything else as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on making my Xp faster!
